Name: Doctor Klyvinski
About the game: Diagnose 30 different diseases and conditions, as diverse as sepsis, drug addiction, Munchausen syndrome and alcohol poisoning. Diagnose your patients through many methods, image their lungs with a x-ray, test their blood for different bacterial cultures, identify the marks on their skin and match their symptoms to possible diseases. 28 days of content, Over 20 different story characters all with different outcomes depending on your choices 10 different endings causing meaningful significant changes depending on your choices
